name: AWS EC2 - Network Packet Capture Was Detected
query: eventSource:"ec2.amazonaws.com" AND eventName:("CreateTrafficMirrorFilter" OR "CreateTrafficMirrorFilterRule" OR "CreateTrafficMirrorSession" OR "CreateTrafficMirrorTarget") AND managementEvent:"true"

name: Error Log Spike - Warning
Amazon EKS - User Deleted Log Events
Amazon EKS - Unauthorized User Trying to Get Secrets
query: objectRef.resource :"secrets" AND verb: ( "list" OR  "watch" OR  "get") AND NOT user.username:system  AND responseStatus.code:"403"

name: High HTTP Latency - Critical SLO Violation
Amazon EKS - Flow Alert - Suspicious Operation Detected From Service Account
Amazon EKS - Suspicious Assignment of Controller Service Account
query: verb:"create" AND objectRef.resource:"pods" AND objectRef.namespace:"kube-system" AND NOT responseObject.spec.serviceAccountName:controller AND NOT user.username:("system:kube-scheduler" OR "system:serviceaccount:kube-system:daemon-set-controller" OR "system:serviceaccount:kube-system" OR "system:serviceaccount:kube-system:job-controller" OR "system:serviceaccount:kube-system:replicaset-controller")

name: AWS EC2 - Network Access Control List Was Created
query: eventSource:"ec2.amazonaws.com" AND eventName:("CreateNetworkAcl" OR "CreateNetworkAclEntry") AND managementEvent:"true"

name: Amazon EKS - System Namespace Used From a Public IP
query: level:"request" AND objectRef.resource:"pods" AND user.username:/system|eks:*/ AND  _exists_: sourceIPAddress  NOT (sourceIPAddress.keyword:/10.*.*.*/  OR sourceIPAddress.keyword:/192.*.*.*/  OR sourceIPAddress.keyword:/172.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[0-1])*.*/  )

name: AWS EC2 - Serial Console Access Was Enabled
Amazon EKS - Delete Action Detected in Kube-System Namespace
query: verb:"delete" AND objectRef.namespace:"kube-system"AND NOT (userAgent:"kube-controller-manager" OR userAgent:"kubelet" OR userAgent:cluster-autoscaler)

name: Amazon EKS - Privileged Pod Created
Amazon EKS - Pod Scan Detected From Unauthorized User
query: verb:list AND  objectRef.resource:pods AND  requestURI:"/api/v1/pods"  AND user.username:"system:anonymous"

name: Amazon EKS - Pod Created with a Sensitive Hostpath Volume
query: objectRef.resource:"pods" AND verb:("create" OR "update" OR "patch") AND requestObject.spec.volumes.hostPath.path:("/" OR "/proc" OR "/root" OR "/var" OR "/var/run/docker.sock" OR "/var/run/crio/crio.sock" OR "/var/run/cri-dockerd.sock" OR "/var/lib/kubelet" OR "/var/lib/kubelet/pki" OR "/var/lib/docker/overlay2" OR "/etc" OR "/etc/kubernetes" OR "/etc/kubernetes/manifests" OR "/home/admin")

name: Amazon EKS - Node Deleted
Amazon EKS - Service Accounts Used From Public IP
query: _exists_: sourceIPs  NOT (sourceIPs.keyword:/10.*.*.*/  OR ssourceIPs.keyword:/192.*.*.*/  OR sourceIPs.keyword:/172.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[0-1])*.*/. OR ssourceIPs.keyword:127.0.0.1. OR sourceIPs.keyword:"::1") AND user.username:"system\:serviceaccount"

name: Service Errors Detected - Hourly Check
Amazon EKS - User Attached to a Pod
Amazon EKS - Node Is Not Available to Run the Pods
AWS EC2 - EC2 Startup Shell Script Changed
Amazon EKS - Multiple Insufficient Memory/CPU Warnings for a Namespace
Count all grouped by severity
AWS EC2 - Snapshot Attribute Was Modified
Amazon EKS - Cluster Deleted
Amazon EKS - User Assigned Cluster-Level Administrative Permissions
query: objectRef.resource:"clusterrolebindings" AND objectRef.name:"cluster-admin" AND responseStatus.code:200 AND NOT userAgent:" kube-apiserver" AND NOT (verb:"get")

name: Amazon EKS - Unhealthy Pod Detected
Amazon EKS - Unauthenticated User Request Is Permitted
query: responseStatus.code:[100 TO 299] AND user.username:"system:anonymous" AND NOT (requestURI:"/healthz" OR requestURI:"/readyz" OR requestURI:"/livez?exclude=kms-provider-0" OR requestURI:"/readyz?exclude=kms-provider-0")

name: Amazon EKS - More Than Usual 4Xx Error Code Received
High CPU Usage - Warning
AWS EC2 - Image Attribute Was Modified
AWS EC2 - VM Export Was Attempted
Amazon EKS Logs - No Logs From EKS
Amazon EKS - User Denied to Exec Into Pod
Amazon EKS - Configmaps Across Multiple Namespaces Updated by a User
query: objectRef.resource:"configmaps"  AND verb:("delete" OR "update" OR "patch") AND NOT  user.username:system AND NOT user.username:"eks:vpc-resource-controller"

name: Amazon EKS - Anomalous Request Detected
query: userAgent: /kubectl-access_matrix/ OR requestURI:/%2Fbin%2Fbash/ OR equestURI:/%2Fbin%2Fsh/ OR equestURI:/%2Fbin%2Fash/

name: Amazon EKS - Cluster Created
query: eventSource:"ecs.amazonaws.com" AND eventName:"CreateCluster" AND NOT userAgent:"cloudformation.amazonaws.com"

name: Amazon EKS - Unauthorized Action Detected From Service Account
query: (user.username.keyword:/.*system:serviceaccount.*/ OR user.username.keyword:/.*system:node.*/ )  AND responseStatus.code:"403"  AND NOT userAgent:("cluster-autoscaler"  OR "kube-controller-manager"  OR "kube-proxy" OR "kubelet" )

name: AWS EC2 - An Existing Route Was Replaced in VPC
Amazon EKS - Suspicious Self Subject Review
query: objectRef.resource:("selfsubjectaccessreviews" OR "selfsubjectrulesreviews") AND ( user.username.keyword:/.*system:serviceaccount.*/ OR user.username.keyword:/.*system:node.*/ OR impersonatedUser.username_keyword:/.*system:node.*/ OR impersonatedUser.username_keyword: /.*system:serviceaccount.*/)

name: Amazon EKS - Pod Created with HostPID
query: objectRef.resource:"pods" AND verb:("create" OR "update" OR "patch") AND requestObject.spec.hostPID:"true" AND  NOT userAgent:"kube-controller-manager"

name: Amazon EKS - User Attempts Multiple Denied Actions
Amazon EKS - Pod Created with HostNetwork
query: objectRef.resource:"pods" AND verb:("create" OR "update" OR "patch") AND  requestObject.spec.hostNetwork:"true" AND NOT  userAgent:"kube-controller-manager"

name: Amazon EKS - Unauthorized User Tried to Create Cronjob
Amazon EKS - Pod Created with HostIPC
query: objectRef.resource:"pods" AND verb:("create" OR "update" OR "patch") AND requestObject.spec.hostIPC:"true"

name: AWS EC2 - Network Access Control List Was Deleted
query: eventSource:"ec2.amazonaws.com" AND eventName:("DeleteNetworkAcl" OR "DeleteNetworkAclEntry") AND managementEvent:"true"

name: Amazon EKS - Flow Alert - Cluster Admin Access Granted After Multiple Unauthorized Operations
Amazon EKS - User Exec Into a Pod
query: objectRef.resource:"pods" AND objectRef.subresource:"exec" AND responseStatus.code:[100 TO 299]

name: Amazon EKS - Exposed Service Created with Type NodePort
query: objectRef.resource:"services" AND verb:("create" OR "update" OR "patch") AND requestObject.spec.type:"NodePort"

name: Amazon EKS - Cluster Created with Public Access
High HTTP Latency - Critical SLO Violation (copy)
Amazon EKS - Network Scanning Detected
AWS EC2 - EBS Encryption Was Disabled
Amazon EKS - Multiple Authentication Requests From Expired Token
Error Log Spike - Warning (copy)
Amazon EKS - Service Account Created
query: verb:create  AND objectRef.subresource:"token" AND objectRef.resource:"serviceaccounts"   AND responseStatus.code:"201" NOT (user.username: /system:node/ OR user.username:controller-manager OR  userAgent:external-secrets)

name: High CPU Usage - Warning (copy)
